column4: I cannot seem to get through the upgrading process to Gutsy, because of the audacious repertory. seems to be down or something. Should I just download the iso, burn and install?
I had to burn it, but any extras you had (if it is an upgrade) will still need to be downloaded. torrent is great.
I have the iso from downloading through torrent. but I would just rather just update through the update manager. I don't have any blank discs kicking around haha
yeah... that's going to take you a while, the servers are being hammered.
